    Screen

    Methods in com.rs.seagull.emulator.api that return BareScreen
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BareScreen
    BareSession.getScreen()
    Returns the currently visible screen.
    BareScreen

    Returns an immutable snapshot, created (if necessary) from this BareScreen.
